SEARCH
Module com.kentwentyfour.project12
Package com.kentwentyfour.project12.bots.improvedbot

Class MazeBot

java.lang.Object
com.kentwentyfour.project12.bots.improvedbot.MazeBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
BotPlayer, MultipleTurnBot
public class MazeBot extends Object implements BotPlayer, MultipleTurnBot
The MazeBot class implements the BotPlayer and MultipleTurnBot interfaces to control a golf ball's path in a maze-like environment. It uses A* algorithm for generating waypoint paths and delegates the main path calculation to BasicBot.

  • Constructor Details

    • MazeBot

      public MazeBot()
      Constructs a new instance of MazeBot. Initializes the physics engine, map manager, and retrieves the golf ball from the reference store.

  • Method Details

    • calculatePath

      public CoordinatesPath calculatePath(GolfBall golfBall, double targetX, double targetY)
      Calculates the path of the golf ball towards the specified target using the BasicBot's path calculation method.
      Specified by:
      calculatePath in interface BotPlayer
      Parameters:
      golfBall - The golf ball object representing the current position and state.
      targetX - The X coordinate of the target.
      targetY - The Y coordinate of the target.
      Returns:
      A CoordinatesPath object representing the calculated path of the golf ball.

    • generateWaypointPath

      public void generateWaypointPath(double targetX, double targetY)
      Generates waypoint path using the SecondAlgorithm to reach the specified target. Waypoints are used for guiding the golf ball towards the target more efficiently.
      Specified by:
      generateWaypointPath in interface MultipleTurnBot
      Parameters:
      targetX - The X coordinate of the target.
      targetY - The Y coordinate of the target.

    • getCurrentWaypointPath

      public List<Waypoint> getCurrentWaypointPath()
      Retrieves the current waypoint path generated by the generateWaypointPath method.
      Specified by:
      getCurrentWaypointPath in interface MultipleTurnBot
      Returns:
      A list of Waypoint objects representing the current waypoint path.
